task.task_description: Based on the content's subject matter, identify ESTABLISHED INDUSTRY KEYWORDS that this content could realistically rank for. Think like a keyword researcher - what are people in this market actually searching for?

task_instructions.instruction: List 5-10 high-value industry keywords this content relates to (terms that exist in the broader market)
Focus on established search terms, not phrases invented from the document
Include estimated search volume category (high, medium, low competition)
Note how well the content currently addresses each keyword (strong fit, partial fit, opportunity)
Consider what competitors in this space are likely targeting

task.task_description: Identify specific long-tail keywords and question-based searches that represent real market demand this content could capture.

task_instructions.instruction: List 10-20 long-tail keywords people actually search for in this industry
Include common question patterns (how to, what is, why does, best way to)
Focus on phrases with clear search intent that match the content's value
Identify niche keyword opportunities with lower competition
Consider voice search and conversational query patterns

task.task_description: Map the content to established INDUSTRY CATEGORIES and MARKET SEGMENTS - not just what the document discusses, but what broader industry topics it belongs to.

task_instructions.instruction: List 3-7 industry topics/categories this content falls under
Use standard industry terminology for topic names
Indicate where this content fits in the broader market landscape
Note related industry topics the content could expand into

task.task_description: Analyze what keyword territory this content competes in and identify strategic positioning opportunities.

task_instructions.instruction: Identify the primary keyword categories this content competes in
Note high-competition keywords where content would need strengthening
Highlight underserved keyword niches the content could own
Suggest keyword differentiation strategies

task.task_description: Map the content to different types of search intent in the market - what are people trying to accomplish when they search for related terms?

task_instructions.instruction: Categorize relevant keywords by intent: informational, navigational, transactional, commercial
Identify which intent types the content best serves
Note intent gaps where content could be optimized
Suggest content modifications to better match high-value intents

task.task_description: Provide actionable recommendations for which industry keywords to prioritize and how to optimize for them.

task_instructions.instruction: Recommend top 5 keywords to prioritize based on fit and opportunity
Suggest content additions needed to rank for target keywords
Identify quick wins (keywords content is close to ranking for)
Note keywords to avoid (poor fit or too competitive)
Provide AI Overview optimization opportunities for featured snippet potential
